Text: Thanks Footy. I really depend on yer stuff. We don't get such coverage in the States.
Thanks, footy - you are a star!
TY! someone needs to give you a skull for your work

Dear footy. Thank you very much for posting F1 and football. It would be really awesome if you could also post in a format that could be transferred straight to a flash drive and watched on a PS3. For all of those people who are unable to hook up a computer to their tv or projector being able to watch sports on a game console is really nice. MKV can't always be transferred to a different format and be watched via a console. I would gladly donated several pounds a month to you if you posted f1 and man u games in such a format. Thanks mate.
Where is the race footy? Globo is up, but its brazillian.. Co'mon.. we are all waiting for you :) btw: Keep up the great work.

@mx468: Why don't you take the initiative convert the file to what ever format you want. Several people are asking Footy make custom download just for them. I convert F1 to MP4/H.264 for my friend to play on his PS3. Download a video convertor and stop bugging Footy.
@SerSpec-V, thank you. you said it all right there. Footy, you rock! keep up the great work!
